text: Uko ni na ko twabakanguye (tubakuye mu bitotsi by’igihe kirekire) kugira ngo babazanye. Umwe muri bo aravuga ati “Mumaze igihe kingana iki (aha)?” (Bamwe) baravuga bati “(Dushobora kuba) tumaze umunsi cyangwa igice cy’umunsi.” (Abandi) baravuga bati “Nyagasani wanyu ni we uzi neza igihe mumaze (aha).” Ngaho nimwohereze umwe muri mwe mu mujyi ajyane iki giceri cyanyu cya Feza, arebe ibiryo byiza kurusha ibindi maze abazaniremo amafunguro. Kandi yitwararike ntatume hagira ubamenya n’umwe
